amendment.description: An amendment numbered 67 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to require the FAA to implement an accountability system that ensures students can schedule an airman practical test in no more than fourteen (14) calendar days after the test is requested.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obernolte amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Obernolte.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Obernolte amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
